statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, prescribed_dosage FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_ratio > 0.8;
SELECT actual_dosage, adherence_ratio FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY adherence_ratio DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescribed_dosage FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_ratio < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE prescribed_dosage != actual_dosage ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescribed_dosage, actual_dosage, adherence_ratio FROM patient_medication_adherence;
SELECT medication_name, patient_id, adherence_ratio FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE adherence_ratio > 0.8;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescribed_dosage FROM patient_medication_adherence ORDER BY medication_name ASC, prescribed_dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_adherence WHERE medication_name LIKE 'A%' AND adherence_ratio < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE medication_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, SUM(medication_dosage) as total_dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage >= 100
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, adherence_status FROM Adherence
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM Medications WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY medication_id
SELECT p.patient_name, a.adherence_status FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Adherence a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.adherence_status = 'Missed' ORDER BY p.patient_name
SELECT * FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN Adherence a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.adherence_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE medication_id = 3;
SELECT adherence_id, adherence_date, adherence_status FROM Adherence WHERE adherence_status = 'Missed';
SELECT prescription_id, prescription_date, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT adherence_status, adherence_date FROM Adherence WHERE adherence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM Patients p JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage='10mg' AND frequency='daily';
SELECT patient_name, adherence_date, adherence_time FROM Patients JOIN Adherence ON Patients.patient_id = Adherence.patient_id WHERE adherence_status='missed';
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY med_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, recommendation FROM Patients INNER JOIN Recommendations ON Patients.patient_id = Recommendations.patient_id
